bio:
I have been working as a web developer / consultant for more than 7 years.
All the successful cases were from the remote work with the international clients. Thus, I always preferred remote collaboration with a flexible working hours and schedule.

I put special emphasis on the architectural traits of the code I write. That's why I consider myself as a software architect rather than a developer.
Such advocacy towards the architectural excellency made me a pro-developer on MVC/MVVM frameworks both on the front-end and the back-end.

Personally, I am easy-going, open-minded, collaborative and highly-disciplined at the same time.
Team-work is what I like the most, it is simply awesome to work with the top-notch brains world-wide.

I am a big fan of "The magic of thinking big", written by Schwartz. And it helps me keep a big picture in my mind regardless of whatever role I take in the projects.

I am sure that you will enjoy every moment of working with me.
I look forward to working with you, soon.

Regards

I am able to work on EST work hours and European work hours.
I am working at home, thus scheduling a day is quite a flexible process for me.
My past contracts with US, Canadian and German clients went really well, especially in terms of communication.

abstrac: Software Engineer(React, Python, Vue, Node, Next.js, React Native, Swift, SwiftUI, Electron, Three.js, WebGL, AR/VR)
bio:
I am a full stack development professional with 8 years of experience with JavaScript, React, Next.js, Vue.js, TypeScript and mobile app development experience with Swift and Java, cross-platform React Native. I also bring to the table considerable experience in cryptocurrency networking and telecommunications.

I bring to the table a passion for technology, implement and deployment, second to none. My previous role as a Software developer, allowed me to increase my knowledge of front-end and back-end development, in particular JavaScript based frameworks such as React, Next, Node.js, Python and cloud-based services AWS, Azure and GCP. My current and past roles have also given me deep, in depth knowledge of cloud computing, systems administrations and TCP/IP networking. I also have experience with VoIP, Server Management, and Linux operating system, both on-prem servers and in the cloud.

I began my career to working in unified Communications service company. I have worked both in solutions development and deployment of a project. I am passionate about learning new technologies and discovering new cultures.

Currently based in Iowa City, Iowa and looking for opportunity to work for long term, full-stack development projects and customers.
40hrs/week

WE TURN INTANGIBLE IDEAS INTO DYNAMIC SOLUTIONS.

If you have an idea in mind for an app of any sort, come to us and watch your app take shape-flawlessly. 

 

We are a top-notch mobile application development company having members with 20yrs+ experience in IT industry and about 7yrs+ experience in App development, and we love challenges and never give up. We have developed iPhone & Android and Web apps for various industries worldwide. Company has been constantly making efforts to achieve a single goal, i.e. to provide an end-to-end Mobile App Development Solutions along with best Web Development Services to the potential clients who are looking out for quality and efficient services. The apps we design are user friendly, addictive and extremely interactive. Testing is a high priority in our work, not an afterthought.

WE CREATE APPS FOR EVERYTHING AND EVERYONE.

Payment Methods

We require payment through SafePay Escrow for new relationships, which 
provides protection for both parties. Invoicing may be requested after 
the first transaction has been completed via SafePay Escrow. Preferred 
payment method is by Check, E-check, or Wire Transfer, however, in some 
cases other methods may be accepted.

Communication : Skype / Hangout / Email are my preferred communication method, although I can also be available 
by phone if necessary. 

Feedback / Endorsement: I value each and every customer that gives me the opportunity to work for them. I rely on their feedback to help me provide the best service possible. Positive feedback tells other employers on the Guru.com

bio:
ZipPixel is many things under one roof. We provide software development, website development, app development, graphic development, SEO, SMO and data entry services with 50+ highly skilled resources. 

Our team is experts in PHP, ASP.NET, Java, Ruby on Rails, Magento, iPhone, Android, etc. catering result-oriented and cost-competitive solutions to across the world. With proven expertise and 150 + successfully completed projects with Top 5% rated skills, over 2000+ worked hours.  

Why clients choose Zippixel ?

* Reasonable Budget
* 50+ highly skilled IT professionals.
* Flexible engagement models.
* Strong technology competency.
* 24/7 support across all timezones.
* Seamless communication
* On Time Delivery 
* Great Leadership
* Customer Satisfaction

Pricing Model:- We work on both lines - hourly/project basis.

Hours of Operation:- 6AM-5PM PST

Preferred Communication:-Our communication with the clients takes place through Phone, Skype chats/call, Webex, TeamViewer, Join me etc

Work Structure:- 

- We choose the developers with right skill sets, and align them under a project manager who will be your point of contact. 
- We adjust our work time to overlap yours for at least 3-4 hours, so we can communicate to you daily. 
- We provide a complete time table of the work plan to you in the beginning.
- You can get a periodical demonstration of work by showing active screens through tools like webex. We can also provide periodical deliveries.
- You also receive weekly written reports of work done. 
- Our QA is involved in the process from day 1 itself.

abstrac: React and React Native Developer | Building Fast, User-Friendly Web and Mobile Apps
bio:
Enthusiastic software engineer with 6+ years experience participating in the complete product development life-cycle of successfully launched applications.
Owns strong debugging and troubleshooting skills that allow me to quickly analyze problems and come to a modern solution that extends the life of the application without rewriting everything from scratch.
Specialized in web application development such as E-Commerce System, Enterprise App, Single Page Application, Health Care System, Learning Management System.

These are my skills:
- TypeScript, JavaScript
- React.js, Redux, React Hooks, Styled Components
- Angular, NgRX, RxJS, Angular Material
- Ionic Framework, React Native, Cordova, PhoneGap
- Node.js, PHP, Laravel, ExpressJS, Python/Djaogo
- MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MSSQL
- HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Bootstrap 3/4
- Git, Github, Bitbucket, Gitlab
- Firebase | FireStore, AWS, Heroku, Jira, Trello, Asana, Clubhouse
- Figma, Zeplin, PSD, Sketch

These are my abilities:
- 40+ hours work per week, Available to start work immediately
- Daily update using Git
- Clean and Efficient code
- Positive attitude, Hard Working, Quick Learning
- 13+ hours online on Email, Skype and Slack everyday

Availability:
I am available to work 40hrs per week and will respond to client messages within 10min during my available hours. My preferred methods of communication are Slack, Skype, etc.

Scope of Work:
I specialize in front-end development using React & TypeScript. My projects typically include developing responsive and user-friendly web applications and interfaces.

Payment Terms:
My hourly rate is $50 or I am available for project-based fees. 

Confidentiality:
I will keep all client information and project details confidential and will not disclose any information without the client's consent. If necessary, I am willing to sign a non-disclosure agreement.

Communication:
I will communicate with the client regularly throughout the project via Slack. I will respond to client messages within 10min during my available hours.
